com.vector.cfg.util.scripting.groovy

Annotation Type VDelegatesToWithClosureParam


  • @Target(value=PARAMETER)
 @Retention(value=CLASS)
 @PublishedApi(value=CLASS_DEPENDENCY)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
 @Documented
public @interface VDelegatesToWithClosureParam
    VDelegatesToWithClosureParam defines the parameter and the DelegatesTo of the annotated Closure. The Class types specify the parameter and the delegation target of the closure. VDelegatesToWithClosureParam provides type information for the Groovy type system and IDE support.

    The usage of VDelegatesToWithClosureParam is especially good to replace the annotations DelegatesTo and VClassClosureParams annotations and the usage of ClosureCalls class.

    Details: the VDelegatesToWithClosureParam is converted during PublishedApi compile time to VClassClosureParams value with one class and a DelegatesTo annotation with class and strategy.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

    See Also:
    Closure, DelegatesTo, VClassClosureParams, ClosureParams

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<?> value
      The type of the DelegatesTo and VClassClosureParams annotations.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int strategy
      The Closure.setResolveStrategy(int).

    • Element Detail

      • value

        @PublishedMethod
public abstract java.lang.Class<?> value
        The type of the DelegatesTo and VClassClosureParams annotations.
        Returns:
        the class[]

      • strategy

        public abstract int strategy
        The Closure.setResolveStrategy(int).
        Returns:
        the Closure resolve strategy
        Default:
        1
